allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove ClosedXML dependency and optimize codebase

- Remove unused ClosedXML package reference and TEST.xlsx file
- Delete superseded MainMenuForm.cs \(replaced by ToolLauncherForm.cs\)
- Create shared DataHelper.BuildDictionary\(\) to consolidate duplicate Build\(\) methods
- Update all data classes to use DataHelper and remove redundant using statements
- Optimize hex formatting in WeaponEditorForm.cs using StringBuilder

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
